lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Demand for shares in state-owned engine maker <Rolls Royce Plc> is expected to be substantial when the government privatises it at the end of April, Christopher Clark of the group's bankers Samuel Montagu and Sons Ltd said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He noted that although the aircraft industry was cyclical, Rolls had several operations -- such as spare parts and military equipment -- that evened out the swings.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He noted that net research and development expenditure was written off in the year it occurred, a policy that received "inadequate recognition in one or two of the more extravagant forecasts of future profits."
